# snowflake4s

[![GitHub Workflow Status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/qwbarch/snowflake4s/Scala%20CI?logo=github)](https://github.com/qwbarch/snowflake4s/actions/workflows/scala.yml)
[![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.qwbarch/snowflake4s)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.qwbarch/snowflake4s_3/1.0.0/jar)
[![javadoc](https://javadoc.io/badge2/io.github.qwbarch/snowflake4s/scaladoc.svg)](https://javadoc.io/doc/io.github.qwbarch/snowflake4s)

[![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)

Visit the [microsite](https://qwbarch.github.io/snowflake4s/) for more information.

## Quickstart

```scala
libraryDependencies += "io.github.qwbarch" %% "snowflake4s" % "1.0.0"
```
